csl_semAux.h File Reference

This is the SEM Auxilary Header File which exposes the various CSL Functional Layer API's to configure the SEM Module. More...

Detailed Description

This is the SEM Auxilary Header File which exposes the various CSL Functional Layer API's to configure the SEM Module.
